pr_title: Add the major version to artifacts

timeline.message:
Add the major version to artifacts
Motivation:
We have dicided to add the major version to actifacts in order not to bring breaking changes
when the the major version of dependencies is increased.

Modifications:
- `dropwizard` -> `dropwizard2`
- `jetty` -> `jetty9`
- `rxjava` -> `rxjava3`
- Spring
  - `spring-boot-actuator-autoconfigure` -> `spring-boot2-actuator-autoconfigure`
  - `spring-boot-actuator-starter` -> `spring-boot2-actuator-starter`
  - `spring-boot-autoconfigure` -> `spring-boot2-autoconfigure`
  - `spring-boot-starter` -> `spring-boot2-starter`
  - `spring-boot-webflux-autoconfigure` -> `spring-boot2-webflux-autoconfigure`
  - `spring-boot-webflux-starter` -> `spring-boot2-webflux-starter`
- `thrift` -> `thrift0.13`
- `tomcat` -> `tomcat9`
- `zookeeper` -> `zookeeper3`

- it
  - `spring-boot-tomcat` -> `spring-boot2-tomcat9`
  - `spring-boot-tomcat8.5` -> `spring-boot2-tomcat8.5`

I didn't add the number to these modules:
`eureka`, `grpc`, `kafka`, `logback` and `saml`
because I think we don't need to support the old versions when they are updated.
But just let me know if I'm missing something.

Results:
- Close #2676
- (Breaking)
  - `armeria-dropwizard` is now `armeria-dropwizard2`.
  - `armeria-jetty` is now `armeria-jetty9`.
  - `armeria-rxjava` is now `armeria-rxjava3`.
  - `armeria-spring-boot-actuator-autoconfigure` is now `armeria-spring-boot2-actuator-autoconfigure`.
  - `armeria-spring-boot-actuator-starter` is now `armeria-spring-boot2-actuator-starter`.
  - `armeria-spring-boot-autoconfigure` is now `armeria-spring-boot2-autoconfigure`.
  - `armeria-spring-boot-starter` is now `armeria-spring-boot2-starter`.
  - `armeria-spring-boot-webflux-autoconfigure` is now `armeria-spring-boot2-webflux-autoconfigure`.
  - `armeria-spring-boot-webflux-starter` is now `armeria-spring-boot2-webflux-starter`.
  - `armeria-thrift` is now `armeria-thrift0.13`.
  - `armeria-tomcat` is now `armeria-tomcat9`.
  - `armeria-zookeeper` is now `armeria-zookeeper3`.
